message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is $10,000. I'm confident this price offers an excellent opportunity for you to acquire something that suits your needs perfectly.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Given the product is worth $10,000 to me, I'm willing to pay $10,500. This is a fair price for both of us, allowing you to make a profit while still being within my budget.
